00022         static String^ ConvertToString(double aNumber, int decDigits, String^ format )
00023         {
00024                 System::Globalization::NumberFormatInfo^ provider;
00025                 System::Globalization::CultureInfo^ MyCI = gcnew System::Globalization::CultureInfo( "en-US",false );
00026                 provider = MyCI->NumberFormat;
00027 
00028                 //number of Decimal digits
00029                 provider->NumberDecimalDigits = decDigits;  
00030 
00031                 //seperator for more than a 3 digits
00032                 provider->NumberGroupSeparator = ""; 
00033 
00034                 return  ((Double)(aNumber)).ToString(format, provider);
00035         }

00037         /**
00038         * @brief Function for converting DCM to euler angles.
00039         * @param eigenvec The matrix with the DCM(eigen vectors).
00040         * @result The resulted Euler angles.
00041         */
00042         static EulerAngles^ EulerAnglesfromEigenVectors(ObservableCollection<double>^ eigenvec)
00043         {
00044                 SpinachGUI::Matrix3x3^ AA=gcnew SpinachGUI::Matrix3x3();
00045 
00046                 //Calculate the determinant of DCM
00047                 double detA= eigenvec[0]*eigenvec[4]*eigenvec[8]
00048                 -eigenvec[0]*eigenvec[5]*eigenvec[7]
00049                 -eigenvec[3]*eigenvec[1]*eigenvec[8]
00050                 +eigenvec[3]*eigenvec[2]*eigenvec[7]
00051                 +eigenvec[6]*eigenvec[1]*eigenvec[5]
00052                 -eigenvec[6]*eigenvec[4]*eigenvec[2];
00053 
00054                 //Translate DCM multiplied by its determinant to a Matrix3x3 matrix
00055                 AA->xx=detA*eigenvec[0];AA->xy=detA*eigenvec[1];AA->xz=detA*eigenvec[2];
00056                 AA->yx=detA*eigenvec[3];AA->yy=detA*eigenvec[4];AA->yz=detA*eigenvec[5];
00057                 AA->zx=detA*eigenvec[6];AA->zy=detA*eigenvec[7];AA->zz=detA*eigenvec[8];
00058 
00059                 //Setup the initial Orientation object
00060                 SpinachGUI::Orientation^ nOrient= gcnew SpinachGUI::Orientation(AA);
00061 
00062                 //Convert to Euler and return
00063                 return nOrient->GetAsEuler();
00064         }
00065 
00066         /**
00067         * @brief Function for converting tensor to the lab frame.
00068         * @param inter Interaction we like to convert.
00069         * @result The resulted interaction matrix.
00070         */
00071         static ::Matrix3x3^ TransformToLab(Tensor ^ inter)
00072         {
00073                 Matrix3d A;
00074                 A<<inter->matrix3x3[0], inter->matrix3x3[1], inter->matrix3x3[2],
00075                         inter->matrix3x3[3], inter->matrix3x3[4], inter->matrix3x3[5],
00076                         inter->matrix3x3[6], inter->matrix3x3[7], inter->matrix3x3[8];
00077 
00078                 Matrix3d refFrame;
00079 
00080                 //Multiplied the reference frames matrices with the interaction matrix
00081                 //Actually Rotation matrix*Interaction Matrix*Transpose rotation matrix
00082                 for(ReferenceFrame^ next=inter->Frame;next!=nullptr;next=next->ParentRefFrame)
00083                 {
00084                         //Convert to Eigen Matrix
00085                         refFrame<<next->matrix3x3[0],next->matrix3x3[1],next->matrix3x3[2],
00086                                 next->matrix3x3[3],next->matrix3x3[4],next->matrix3x3[5],
00087                                 next->matrix3x3[6],next->matrix3x3[7],next->matrix3x3[8];
00088                         A=refFrame*A*refFrame.transpose();
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 //Convert to Matrix3x3 matrix
00092 		::Matrix3x3^ result=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00093                 for(int i=0;i<9;i++) result[i]=A(i);
00094 
00095                 return result;
00096         }
